description: WEIS DAIRY FREE FROZEN DESSERT HALF & HALF RASPBERRY & DARK C 1 LTRWEIS HALF AND HALF DAIRY FREE 1L, a delicious frozen combination of Raspberry Sorbet and Dark Chocolate Frozen Dessert in a tub. The best of two worlds! Weis have taken inspiration from our famous two-tone bars and created a 1L Tub to delight the senses,  and easy to scoop!  The sweetest raspberries combined to delight with our indulgent dark chocolate frozen dessert - perfectly paired, all you have to do is enjoy!  A delicious alternative to ice cream, as a gluten and dairy-free treat. We also have two other delicious flavours in the Weis Half and Half range, so give these ice cream tubs a try too. Great for sneaky spoonfuls or family gatherings or simply an after dinner dessert treat, made the Weis way. At Weis, our products are based on recipes, so the focus is on the subtle blending of real ingredients and ultimately the taste. Our knowledge and expertise in sourcing and working with all different kinds of fruits, premium grade nuts and natural ingredients enables us to create unique combinations and taste experiences. Made in Australia since 1957. Visit our website to find our more about our full range of exciting flavours and our farm to freezer story.Sweet Raspberry delight meets an indulgent Chocolate Frozen Dessert. Dairy- Free and Delicious!Real Fruit and Dairy-Free  Frozen Dessert, bringing two flavours together, to enjoy in one tub.Quality ingredients that contain no artificial flavours and are Gluten FreeLight fruit Indulgence, so treat yourself!Delicious 1L tub, perfect for family and friend dessert occasions.Weis, made in Australia since 1957. Our famous two-tone, now in a tub!
name: Weis Half & Half Raspberyy & Dark Chocolate Frozen Dessert Tub 1l
